default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I never make any effort to conceal my identity while traversing WhiteSands. The fact that the MBCC's tracked my movements based on this intel was simply a statistical inevitability, not fate.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Let's proceed to the deeper sections now.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: The logic behind fate has been completely dismantled. Any future outcome depends solely on my own decisions.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Obstacle eliminated. Proceeding deeper.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Hold still. Assess the situation carefully and we'll take it down in one clean strike.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Victory is never an accident, but the inevitable result of meticulous planning.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Keep it together. The situation isn't that dire. It's panic that will get you killed.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: I will determine my own fate!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Keep going, don't worry about me...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Those who blindly trust intuition and luck in tombs usually end up permanent residents, just like the original occupants.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: I've explored countless tombs before. If the only thing you do when trapped is cry for help, the only response you'll get is the same desperate echo.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: The Bottomless Pit is the most treacherous tomb there is, but if you want to go, I can take you on a tour without breaking a sweat. All those supernatural rumors are just smokescreens. With me leading the way, even the spirits will step aside.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: If you need help, just say so. I'll get you what you ask for.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Compared to when I was in the tombs, I sleep longer at the MBCC and have fewer nightmares... Based on my experience, it's probably due to the higher quality bedding.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I've never believed in fate. If flipping the coin can grant me fate's guidance, then gripping it means holding fate in my own hands.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hey. Still alive? That's... good. Um, I'm not great at small talk.

default.title: Idle
default.text: I noticed you're busy, so I found something to keep myself occupied. Just call if you need me.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Bored? Hmm... Don't be.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: This mission is rather complicated. I'll scout ahead first.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Mission complete. The target location has a complex structure, so I've compiled a route guide we can use for future operations.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: You just want to watch me? I don't quite understand why, but whatever you say.
